description: abstracted image with large yellow face with green metallic around eyes and blue lips at L; green radiating ovals at bottom; two horizontal rows of multicolored buildings and blue bands at top; squares and circles of various colors at L; metallic gold linear repeat of same image in ULC in margin
inscription: center bottom, in black: [203/300 (illegible)]; LR, in red and gold: three Japanese seal imprints; LR, in gold and black: [2027/3000]; LRC, in gold: [300 NUMBERS ENDING WITH / 7/ ARE SIGNED BY THE ARTIST]
markings: LLC, in gold: three printer and publisher seal imprints;
portfolio: From Number 7 from the portfolio "Look at it on a Rainy Day"
provenance: Martin Weinstein, Minneapolis; given to MIA, 2007.
signed: LL, in the print, in blue: Friedenscreich 691A Lengmoos 1971
title: Irinaland over the Balkans
